attributes.action: stop English tax payers funding the rest of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all the news of yet another raid on the UKs purse by devovled countries, ie free school meals for all in Scotland, it is about time the UK government set aside money for each of the devolved countries and told them when it runs out you get no more. This way money would be distributed evenly and if they want to spend this on free meals - let them, free university places - let them, free prescriptions - let them. When the money runs out don't give them any more....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
